AcceptedFactionInvite.notes: Fires when receiving confirmation that a local player has accepted a faction invite.

AcceptedSafehouseInvite.notes: Fires when a player accepts an invite to a safehouse.

AcceptedTrade.notes: Fires when the other player in the client's current trade accepts or declines the trade.

AddXP.notes: Fires when a local character gains xp, unless it is flagged not to.

DoSpecialTooltip.notes: Fires when updating the tooltip of an IsoObject with a special tooltip.

EveryHours.notes: Fires at the start of every in-game hour.

LevelPerk.notes: Fires after a local character gains or loses a perk level.

LoadGridsquare.notes: Fires after a new square is loaded.

MngInvReceiveItems.notes: Fires when managing a remote player's inventory from the admin menu.

OnAIStateChange.notes: Fires when a local character (zombie, player) changes state.

OnAcceptInvite.notes: Fires when the client accepts a steam invite to a server. See Steamworks API

onAddForageDefs.notes: Fires after the foraging item definitions are created.

OnAddMessage.notes: Fires when a message is added to chat.

OnAdminMessage.notes: Fires when a ticket is created and the local player is an admin. The co-ordinates are the location of the player creating the ticket.

OnAmbientSound.notes: Fires whenever a sound meta event or building alarm is triggered.

OnCGlobalObjectSystemInit.notes: Fires when the client GlobalObject system is being initialised.

OnChallengeQuery.notes: Fires when the main menu wants to check for challenge maps.

OnCharacterCollide.notes: Fires when a non-zombie character collides with another (possibly zombie) character.

OnCharacterDeath.notes: Fires when any character dies, including zombies and players regardless of whether they are local.

OnChatWindowInit.notes: Fires when the chat window is initialised.

OnClientCommand.notes: Fires when a client command sent through sendClientCommand is received by the server.

OnClimateManagerInit.notes: Fires when the climate manager is initialised.

OnClimateTickDebug.notes: Fires every climate manager tick, but only on the client and only when debug mode is enabled.

OnClothingUpdated.notes: Fires every time a character's clothing is updated. This includes when accumulating dirt or blood.

OnConnectFailed.notes: Fires when the client fails to connect to a server.

OnConnected.notes: Fires after successfully connecting to a server on the main menu, before character creation begins.

OnConnectionStateChanged.notes: Fires when the client's connection state is updated while trying to connect to a server.

OnContainerUpdate.notes: Fires when a container is added or removed from the world.

OnCoopJoinFailed.notes: Fires when a splitscreen character fails to be added.

OnCoopServerMessage.notes: Fires when receiving a server message during a co-op (in-game hosted) game.

OnCreateLivingCharacter.notes: Fires when an IsoPlayer or IsoSurvivor object is created.

OnCreatePlayer.notes: Fires every time a local player loads into the world.

OnCreateSurvivor.notes: Fires when an IsoSurvivor object is created.

OnCreateUI.notes: Fires when the UI is initialised.

OnCustomUIKey.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

OnCustomUIKeyReleased.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

OnCustomUIKeyPressed.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is pressed.

OnDestroyIsoThumpable.notes: Fires when an IsoThumpable object is destroyed by damage.

OnDeviceText.notes: Fires whenever a radio displays text.

OnDisconnect.notes: Fires when the client disconnects from a server.

onDisableSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player disables search mode.

OnDistributionMerge.notes: Fires when the distribution tables merge.

OnDoTileBuilding2.notes: Fires when the local mouse and keyboard player builds something.

OnDoTileBuilding3.notes: Fires when a controller player builds something.

OnDynamicMovableRecipe.notes: Fires when a local character crafts a dynamically generated Moveable scrapping recipe.

onEnableSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player enables search mode.

OnEnterVehicle.notes: Fires when a character enters a vehicle.

OnEquipPrimary.notes: Fires when a character equips a new item in their primary slot.

OnEquipSecondary.notes: Fires when a character equips a new item in their secondary slot.

OnExitVehicle.notes: Fires when a character exits a vehicle.

OnFETick.notes: Fires every tick while on the main menu.

OnFillContainer.notes: Fires whenever a container is first filled with loot, or when loot respawns. Never fires for corpses. For vehicle containers, the roomType is instead the vehicle type.

OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires after the context menu for an inventory item is created.

OnFillInventoryContextMenuNoItems.notes: Fires after the context menu for an empty inventory is created.

onFillSearchIconContextMenu.notes: Fires when opening the context menu for a foraging item.

OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires after the context menu for a world object is created.

OnGameBoot.notes: Fires after the game finishes starting up. Note: For clients, lua files in lua/server/ will not have loaded by the time this event is fired. This does not apply to servers.

OnGameStart.notes: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnGameStateEnter.notes: Fires upon entering the Terms Of Service game state.

OnGamepadConnect.notes: Fires after a controller is connected.

OnGamepadDisconnect.notes: Fires after a controller is disconnected.

OnGetDBSchema.notes: Fires when receiving the database schema from the server.

OnGetTableResult.notes: Fires when receiving a database table query result from the server.

OnGridBurnt.notes: Fires when a square is burned by fire.

OnHitZombie.notes: Fires whenever a zombie is hit by a character.

OnInitGlobalModData.notes: Fires when GlobalModData is initialised. This is the earliest event after Sandbox Options are loaded.

OnInitModdedWeatherStage.notes: Fires when a modded weather period is created.

OnInitSeasons.notes: Fires when the ErosionManager is created.

OnInitWorld.notes: Fires after the world has initialised.

onItemFall.notes: Fires when a local character is forced to drop the items in their hands.

OnJoypadActivate.notes: Fires whenever a controller starts being used during gameplay.

OnJoypadActivateUI.notes: Fires whenever a controller starts being used outside of gameplay, such as on the main menu.

OnJoypadBeforeDeactivate.notes: Fires when a controller is disconnected, before disconnection is processed.

OnJoypadBeforeReactivate.notes: Fires when a controller is connected, before connection is processed.

OnJoypadDeactivate.notes: Fires after a controller has been disconnected.

OnJoypadReactivate.notes: Fires after a controller has been connected.

OnJoypadRenderUI.notes: Fires when rendering controller debug UI.

OnKeyKeepPressed.notes: Fires every frame while a key is held down.

OnKeyPressed.notes: Fires when a key is released.

OnKeyStartPressed.notes: Fires when a key starts being pressed.

OnLoad.notes: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnLoadedMapZones.notes: Fires after loading the map zones.

OnLoadedTileDefinitions.notes: Fires after loading the tile definitions.

OnLoadMapZones.notes: Fires before loading the map zones.

onLoadModDataFromServer.notes: Fires when the server sends a square's moddata to the clients, or when the client receives it.

OnLoadRadioScripts.notes: Fires after ZomboidRadio loads the radio scripts.

OnLoadSoundBanks.notes: Fires after the game loads the FMOD sound banks.

OnMainMenuEnter.notes: Fires upon entering the main menu.

OnMechanicActionDone.notes: Fires after a character completes a mechanic action on a vehicle.

OnMiniScoreboardUpdate.notes: Fires when the admin mini-scoreboard is updated.

OnModsModified.notes: Fires on the main menu when a mod's files have changed.

OnMouseDown.notes: Fires when the player left clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

OnMouseMove.notes: Fires every frame, unless mouse movement is eaten by something else. The latter two values are the first two multiplied by the mouse player's zoom level.

OnMouseUp.notes: Fires whenever the player releases the left mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

OnMultiTriggerNPCEvent.notes: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

OnNewFire.notes: Fires when a new fire is started.

OnNewGame.notes: Fires whenever a local player character is created for the first time.

OnObjectAboutToBeRemoved.notes: Fires before a tile object is removed from the world, either because it has been destroyed or because it has been unloaded.

OnObjectAdded.notes: Fires when an object is added to the world. Note: usually not called on the client, but is in some cases.

OnObjectCollide.notes: Fires when two objects collide with each other.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown.notes: Fires when the player left clicks a world object.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp.notes: Fires when the player releases left click on a world object.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown.notes: Fires when the player right clicks a world object.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp.notes: Fires when the player releases right click on a world object.

OnPlayerAttackFinished.notes: Fires when a local player finishes attacking.

OnPlayerDeath.notes: Fires when a local player dies.

OnPlayerGetDamage.notes: Fires every time a local player takes damage. Bleeding bodyparts fire the event once per frame each. Possible damageTypes are: POISON, HUNGRY, SICK, BLEEDING, THIRST, HEAVYLOAD, INFECTION, LOWWEIGHT, FALLDOWN, FIRE, WEAPONHIT, CARHITDAMAGE, CARCRASHDAMAGE It also fires when zombies are hit by weapons: this is the only case in which the event fires on the server.

OnPlayerMove.notes: Fires during each local player's update if they are walking.

OnPlayerUpdate.notes: Fires during each local player's update (every tick).

OnPostDistributionMerge.notes: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPostFloorLayerDraw.notes: Fires after a floor layer has been rendered.

OnPostMapLoad.notes: Fires after the map has been loaded.

OnPostRender.notes: Fires after every in-game rendering frame.

OnPostSave.notes: Fires after saving and exiting the game.

OnPostUIDraw.notes: Fires after every UI render frame

OnPreDistributionMerge.notes: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires while the context menu for an inventory item is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreFillInventoryContextMenuNoItems.notes: Fires while the context menu for an empty inventory is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires while the context menu for a world object is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreMapLoad.notes: Fires before the map starts loading.

OnPressRackButton.notes: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to rack it.

OnPressReloadButton.notes: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to reload it.

OnPressWalkTo.notes: Fires when the local player 1 presses their Walk To keybind. The values passed are always 0,0,0

OnPreUIDraw.notes: Fires before every UI render frame

OnReceiveGlobalModData.notes: Fires when receiving a global moddata table. The table argument is false if the table did not exist.

OnReceiveItemListNet.notes: Fires when receiving a list of items from another player.

OnReceiveUserlog.notes: Fires when receiving another client's Userlogs.

OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers.notes: Fires when the available containers in the inventory UI change.

OnResetLua.notes: Fires after Lua has been reloaded.

OnResolutionChange.notes: Fires whenever the window resolution changes.

OnRightMouseDown.notes: Fires when the player right clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

OnRightMouseUp.notes: Fires whenever the player releases the right mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

OnSafehousesChanged.notes: Fires every time a safehouse is added, removed or changed.

OnSave.notes: Fires while saving the world, after characters and sandbox options have been saved, but before global mod data and the world have been saved.

OnScoreboardUpdate.notes: Fires when the client receives an update to the in-game scoreboard.

OnSeeNewRoom.notes: Fires when a room becomes visible for the first time.

OnServerCommand.notes: Fires when a server command sent through sendServerCommand is received by the client.

OnServerFinishSaving.notes: Fires when the server has finished saving and unpauses the game.

OnServerStarted.notes: Fires when the server has started and can now be connected to.

OnServerStartSaving.notes: Fires when the server has paused the game to save.

OnServerStatisticReceived.notes: Fires when the MPStatistics have been received from the server.

OnServerWorkshopItems.notes: Fires when receiving an update about the server's Steam Workshop items while connecting.

OnSetDefaultTab.notes: Fires when the player sets their favourite chat window tab.

OnSGlobalObjectSystemInit.notes: Fires when the server GlobalObject system has been initialised.

OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.notes: Fires when the spawn regions have been loaded.

OnSteamFriendStatusChanged.notes: Fires when the player has gained or lost a steam friend.

OnSteamGameJoin.notes: Fires when the player joins a game through steam.

OnSteamRefreshInternetServers.notes: Fires when the steam server list has been refreshed.

OnSteamRulesRefreshComplete.notes: Fires after a server's rules are retrieved. 'rules' is a table of information about the server.

OnSteamServerResponded.notes: Fires when receiving a server for the server list.

OnSteamServerResponded2.notes: Fires when receiving a server for the favourited server list.

OnSteamWorkshopItemCreated.notes: Fires when the client successfully uploads a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotCreated.notes: Fires when the client fails to upload a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotUpdated.notes: Fires when the client fails to update a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemUpdated.notes: Fires when the client successfully updates a workshop item.

OnSwitchVehicleSeat.notes: Fires when a local character moves seats in a vehicle.

OnTabAdded.notes: Fires when a tab is added to the chat.

OnTabRemoved.notes: Fires when a tab is removed from the chat.

OnThrowableExplode.notes: Fires when a throwable or trap explodes.

OnTickEvenPaused.notes: Fires every game tick, even if the game is paused. Tick is 0 while paused.

OnTileRemoved.notes: Fires when a tile object is removed.

onToggleSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player toggles search mode.

OnTriggerNPCEvent.notes: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

onUpdateIcon.notes: Fires when an ISForageIcon is moved or removed.

OnUpdateModdedWeatherStage.notes: Fires when a modded weather stage tries to be updated.

OnUseVehicle.notes: Fires when a local character enters or exits a vehicle.

OnVehicleDamageTexture.notes: Fires when a vehicle part has become damaged enough to gain a damage overlay.

OnWaterAmountChange.notes: Fires when the amount of water in an object changes.

OnWeaponHitCharacter.notes: Fires when a non-zombie character is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitThumpable.notes: Fires when an IsoThumpable is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitTree.notes: Fires when a tree is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitXp.notes: Fires when XP is being granted for an attack.

OnWeaponSwing.notes: Fires when a player begins swinging a weapon.

OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.notes: Fires when a local player's attack connects.

OnWeatherPeriodComplete.notes: Fires when a weather period finishes.

OnWeatherPeriodStage.notes: Fires when a weather period progresses a stage.

OnWeatherPeriodStart.notes: Fires when a weather period begins.

OnWeatherPeriodStop.notes: Fires when a weather period ends early, such as by an admin command.

OnWorldSound.notes: Fires whenever a world sound is created.

OnZombieDead.notes: Fires when a zombie dies. The zombie's inventory is not filled with loot when this event fires, but their clothing and attached items are added.

preAddCatDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes item category definitions.

preAddForageDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes any definitions.

preAddItemDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes item definitions.

preAddSkillDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes trait and profession definitions.

preAddZoneDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes zone definitions.

ReceiveFactionInvite.notes: Fires when the client receives a faction invite.

ReceiveSafehouseInvite.notes: Fires when the client receives a safehouse invite.

RequestTrade.notes: Fires when the client receives a trade request.

ReuseGridsquare.notes: Fires before a square is unloaded.

SendCustomModData.notes: Fires when a client is requesting server moddata.

ServerPinged.notes: Fires when receiving a ping response from the server. The 'numClients' string is suffixed with '/512'.

SwitchChatStream.notes: Fires when the client switches chat tabs.

SyncFaction.notes: Fires when the client receives changes to a faction.

TradingUIAddItem.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade adds an item.

TradingUIRemoveItem.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade removes an item.

TradingUIUpdateState.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade changes the state of the trade.

ViewTickets.notes: Fires when receiving the list of tickets from the server.

Attack.notes: Called every tick while a local character is pressing their attack button and is able to attack.

AutoDrink.notes: Called whenever a character automatically drinks while auto-drink is turned on.

CalculateStats.notes: Called when a character's stats are being updated. Character health is not included.

WeaponHitCharacter.notes: Called when the effects of an attack are being calculated.

WeaponSwing.notes: Called when a weapon is swung to find targets
